title: I put on a suit and went to Australia for this

comments.comment: bjorn is really a reality check on how fast time flies
When a book says ‘and they lived happily ever after’ this is what I imagine
Bjorn had the luckiest spawn ever
If you had told me 5 years ago that Felix would have the most wholesome dad content living his best life in Japan I would have thought you were crazy
Watching Felix live life is actually more inspiring than most self-help podcasts out there.
Why tf his vlogs look like the happiest memories from a movie
i love how felix is slowly morphing to mimic the looks of his father and bjorn looks likes his morphing into felix younger self
Seeing Edgar so old and his eyes so full of love and life... he's such a beautiful dog!
Marzia is unbelievably pretty, and she ALWAYS wears the most amazing outfits <3
With al the YouTubers turning out to be horrible people, its refreshing to see someone as loving and caring as Felix. I hope Bjron appreciates you more and more as he grows.
0:11 the kid in the background lol

I used to watch Pewds religiously back when he did his Fridays with PewDiePie. I come back to check the channel now and then, and so much has changed. It’s unreal to see how much has changed and how much he’s changed. Felix went from this guy that my parents yelled at me for watching because he was immature, and then he turned into this awesome dad, husband, and man. I’m so happy for him and his family.

These vlogs unironically are one of my favorite reminders on how beautiful life can be and how in spite of everything, it is worth living. Thank you, Felix and Marzia, thank you for sharing such positivity with the world, I hope you and your family the best for the future, keep being a great example. And for the bros, keep going, we too are going to make it some day
2:21 omg Björn choosing Bulbasaur and Felix acknowledging it is Marzia's favorite was everything
not felix capturing that kid falling lmaoo

i cant watch these kinds of videos without tearing up. Seeing someone from my childhood being such a loving father figure. How beautiful their little family is. I hope to one day find the joy and contentment as they have.
man björn is so loved and he knows, you can see it in every second of the video. Making me cry and wishing to offer my future children the same kind of love.

We are so happy to be featured in your latest vlog! Thank you for visiting our little part of Australia at The Bower Estate in Queensland. Next time you're back, we would love to take your family on an eco tour adventure! Until then, happy holidays <3
So, this is what a "life" looks like. You've earned it, mate. Not all of us can.

I also have a daughter who is almost 15 months. I grew up watching your videos in high school and now I’m 28. A lot of the little cute things Bjorn was doing, my daughter does the same. Very cute and enjoying the time while she’s little. Cannot believe it’s already been a year since both our kids have been born. You are doing a great job being a new dad! Congrats on the beautiful family Felix. Much love from Arkansas, USA
Feels good to see Pewdiepie collab with Felix and his son again. How nice of him to help out smaller youtubers. Hope to see Felix here more often <3
2:20 every child's canon event

35:45 when i saw felix dancing with marzia, made me tear up. i feel like we all grew up together  and it is very sad to see the past slipping away from us, but we are moving towards a bright future every second.

I feel like pewdiepie is such an escape from reality. The positive comments are nice, and the video is beautiful. Of course, I'm sure things are far from perfect, but it's a nice change of pace. It feels like I'm somewhere away from the rest of the world/internet/drama.
I can't watch a single one of these vlogs without crying. Thank you, Felix, for sharing your life with us..
Ken and Felix dadding it up together. I love it
as an aussie its so weird to see you do all the things ive done in the same places, very wholesome and brings back a lot of memories growing up on the gold coast, much love
It just makes me so happy to see anything related to Felix and Ken, like it's such a nice and comfy friendship. It made me emotional!
The way Marzia just shines and looks so beautiful is crazy. Her soul shines right through her
Bro PewDiePie is so humble, he is literally staying out of Drama, he is being a supportive dad, love to see the goat of YouTube back again with another video
I really love seeing Felix and Ken together, I've watched both of them for so long it's so nice seeing a little bit of their reunion ️
bjorn gives me BAD baby fever
Aussie birds filmed are rainbow lorikeets, ibis, bluefaced honeyeater, brush turkey
Bjorn is ready to plan his conquest for Australia now
MARZIA LOOKS GORGEOUS
That very subtle but full of love statement when pewds pointed to Marzia wearing that dress, "straight from a movie" not to be cheesy but that was so genuine and sweet. Lovely fam <3
12:57 bjorn flipping us off cuz he’s having a better time
watching felix and ken together just put the biggest smile on my face, truly grateful to both of them for making me laugh through my best and worst times. i love you both so much

I'm aussie and been following you almost since the beginning, I've just recently had a baby boy named Magnus, seeing you come to Australia and visiting all the places i did as a kid was amazing, truly inspiring to do the same for my boy.
Easy spawn for Bjorn, nice healthy and wealthy family and good location, good for him, hope he has a great life.
26:22 By how bjorn hug felix is so adorable
All the sadness and pain went away immediately after seeing Bjorn
lmao pewds at the wedding entertaining the kids whilst all the other adults are talking 35:37
@ 2:44, old wives tale: When your baby does that, means momma's pregnant. Or if someone else's baby does that, but when they bend over; their face is facing you.
Every time I see Marzia she’s just a fashion icon 24/7
Marzia is so beautiful, and I think it is so sweet you guys are recording these memories for Bjorn when he gets older to watch. This video healed a part of me

Finally a YouTuber 
 who visits australia.

Marzia's dresses are to die for They are so cute and honestly she looks so good in each and every dress she wears . I love theses vlogs and the editing style It's so cozy and nice . I would love to watch your vlogs they give such a relaxing and wholesome vibe
29:45 marzia being so soft but felix screaming "waaah waaah"  dead.
2:20 Pewd's letting Bjorn pick his first starter Pokemon. I'm so happy as a Pokemon fan. Papa Pewd's is a cultured man 🫡
3:08 Pewds giving his best japanese impression
A funny fact is that those birds at 29:38 are commonly referred to as "bin chickens"
Those birds they saw at the park at 29:36, in Australia we call them bin chickens because they will get into your rubbish bin. Proper term I think is ibis.
Im Australian and when he said the sand squeaks I thought duh it's sand it always does that but then I rememberd European beaches have stones
34:02 "erm... he's right behind me... isn't he?"
Can we all aknowledge Bjorns little smirk at 34:55

Marzia's editing is amazing, the filters, fonts and music and even cuts to different videos are so beautiful and peaceful to watch. I love the different atmospheres in this one, from the ball pit, hotel room storm, and different amusement and theme parks. The wedding location was beautiful and I loved the lit up tree you danced in front of. These videos are so wholesome and happy, they give me so much hope and I love watching them. Bjorn is getting so big, that means were that much closer to gta 6. much love
seeing bjorn grew up, our king's son... is just so amazing. it's like bjorn has thousands of uncles and aunties
14:20 bjorn is practicing his thumbnail faces
This kid is gonna know Italian, Swedish, Japanese and English! What a powerhouse!
from kid screaming at barrels in his cellar, to number one dadtuber of the platform. Pewds has truly won at life
19:51 Nope, that’s mating.
You guys made me feel so proud to be an Aussie,  thank you for showcasing your wonderful time in Australia.

Bro, I'm 27 now and figuring out life. When Felix said, 'Be safe out there, gamers' in the ad, it brought back so many memories. It's crazy how I was watching him religiously as a teenager and very early 20s, and now I just come back from time to time to check on him in a way.  It's crazy how fast life moves. From a dumb teenager in Nigeria to a slightly less dumb adult living in The Netherlands -- always a gamer. Bro Fist.
IM SO HAPPY TO SEE KEN AND FELIX TOGETHER!! it must've been so long! also a glimpse of ken and mary's vow renewal :') i always enjoy the vlog so much!
It’s so weird being from the Gold Coast and seeing Pewdiepie play with Bjorn on the same playgrounds I used to play on.

I’ve grown up and lived on the Gold Coast most of my life, and it’s so crazy to see Pewds visit places I’ve been to so many times. Hope you enjoyed your stay, made me realise how much I’ve taken this beautiful city for granted.

Bjorn is getting to be such a big boy and he gets cuter and cuter! I love all of his expressions. That’s one of the most fun and satisfying parts of watching a child grow is seeing their new expressions and their personality start to form.
35:00 I was not ready for that song choice
Marzia was born to be a mother. She is glowing! Love to see you guys so happy.
29:38 BIN CHICKEN!!
Why bjorn looks like he will be perfect to be baby's day out the series main character
it's so wholesome to see felix spending time with bjorn!!

This vlog was beautiful. 
Also Congratulations to Mary and Ken for their vow renewal ️ Mary looked absolutely gorgeous.
7:02 That small glimpse of Marzia smiling as if her life is complete and she's truly happy in life is heart-warming. She's such a beautiful soul

i first came across Felix during amnesia days. i was a loser typical child entering highschool. now, i came across his channel once again. it feels so surreal watching my favorite youtuber live a happy yet calm life. and ironically, i'm graduating and will soon be entering university. this just reminded me that i'm growing old, and at some point i'd stop watching them. but i do hope not. 

i saw felix when he was an obnoxious, funny, and energetic streamer, posting constantly and eventually making a name for himself globally. now i love how calm he is, now a married man, has a beautiful kid, and is living happily all while making archives for his child to see when he's older. i'm so proud of how far and happy in life they are. I'm so glad to be a part of his journey. Brofist to you pewds, you were there along with Jacksepticeye and Mark who shaped my childhood and teenage years.

i hope he wins in life:)
34:53 I am menlting!! his little expression is so adorable, Bjorn with his hair to the side like that looks like small Felix, and the other times with his pointy hair he looks like older Felix lol
Marzia is so talented, the way you edit the videos is perfect. Thank you!
Marzias mom glow is actually insane! So incredibly gorgeous! ( in the most respectful way. Not being a douche bag on pewds wife! )
Glad you guys had an awesome time! Stoked to see Ken too, I forgot he moved to Aussie so was a total surprise

God—i remember my early days back in 2012 falling in love with Pewd’s videos. How chaotic and crazy his co-ops were and his solo gameplay. His Fridays with Pewdiepie. Now here we are, watching him raise his son, taking care of his family, traveling. It’s so beautiful to see how much they’ve grown throughout the years. Take care and safe travels, you beautiful family️

Honestly Bro won in life 
He got a family, friends and a kid 
With peaceful life 
God bless him
29:34 They're like raccoons, but instead of trash pandas, they're bin chickens.
I haven't watched in a little bit but dang Bjorn is growing fast. Scandinavian and Italian genes going strong.
This is honestly beautiful to see. It’s amazing to see how Felix has really grown up to be a brilliant person and father.
i wonder how many languages bjorn will grow up speaking? an italian mother, a swedish father, on an english speaking YT channel living in a japanese speaking country

It was so surreal seeing Felix walk through places I had gone as a child (Gold Coast segment) and I was gradually becoming more and more excited for him to discover the beach sand and the wildlife. So happy you had a wonderful time here!
12:56 aww his first middle finger
Kjellberg family gives me the hope of living happily
Seeing Pewds together with Ken made me so happy. Great dads.
It's extra wholesome that we can hear his little voice more because he's nearing to talk🥹 and you and Marzia are just glowing
Watching you in Australia is like watching an episode of Bluey.
So happy for Ken and Mary! It’s so sweet when couples renew their vows and the ceremony looked gorgeous! Beautiful and happy times all around!!!
Pewdiepie's channel has become an internet detox for all the crazy negativity and politics.  It's just a man, his family, and easy-going positivity.
Man Australia really is one of the most beautiful countries in the world
the way that pewds always compiments marz and the way he looks at her <3 what they have is so loving and Bjorn just ties it all together
Thank you for releasing Ken out of his basement for some enrichment

I loved everything about this vlog. A little bit of Japan. Disneyland. Björn growing up, getting cuter, and choosing his first starter Pokémon. Marzia being happy and gorgeous as always. Felix and Marzia winning the life lottery.

To top it all off, Ken and Mary!!
